::Magmatron::

    "You are Destrons," He said simply. "Cerberus, and any o=
ther member of my troops will treat you differently."
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Satu=
rday, December 23, 2000 8:07 PM
  Subject: Re: To Dachande


  ::Shredder::=


  Shredder nods. "I'll ask Magmatron about that."

  Shredder opens a com=
m to Magmatron. "Magmatron, me and the others 
  here arn't pleased with ho=
w Cerberus treated his team. If we can get 
  the garauntee that we will be=
 treated as well as the others, we'll 
  continue to be Destrons. If not, w=
e won't."



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
  > Ramjet: =
Well, personally, i dont know what i think.  I've been a 
  loyal 
  > Dest=
ron for a long time.  Me and my team served under Magmatron, 
  then 
  > B=
obertron, and now you.  i cant picture myself not being a 
  Destron.  But =
on 
  > the other hand, that Cerberus guy basically denounced the fact that=
 
  we are 
  > Destrons.  I will only continue if Magmatron insures us tha=
t our 
  lives are 
  > not in danger and that we will be considered as muc=
h Destrons as 
  his other 
  > troops are.
  > ::The others agree and wait=
 for Shredders responce::


        eGroups Sponsor
